attributes.action: Give former king, Charles II his own effigy at Westminster Abbey.
attributes.additional_details: He deserves more than a vault grave.
attributes.background: To put an effigy on top of Charles II's grave in honour of the king who restorted the monarchy.

rejection.details: Westminster Abbey is a Church of England church directly responsible to the sovereign, so decisions relating to the Abbey are a matter for the Church of England and Her Majesty the Queen, not the Government or House of Commons.
